p: Lethal doses of the lemongrass oil increased from first to fifth instars with LD 50 of 1.08 to 139.30 μg/insect −1 and LD 90 of 2.02 to 192.05 μg/insect −1. The LD 50 and LD 90 of the lemongrass for third instar P. nigrispinus nymphs was 21.58 and 28.35 μg/insect −1, respectively. Mortality was always <1% in the control (Table 1).
